name: Scubaru
description:
Best enjoyed in full-screen mode.

This was our student project created for the CSCI356 - Game Engine Essentials course at the University of Wollongong Dubai.

Controls:

Movement: WASD / Arrow keys

Dash: Space bar

Shoot (unlock required): E or Right Mouse button

Interact with cities: F

Developed in Unity for Windows desktop

Credits:
  • Programming & Boss AI by Vipul Vikraman
  • Cave Design & Enemy AI by Hana Sherif Mahmoud
  • Cave Design by Shweta Chapla
  • Game Concept & UI by Jacob Sanjay
External Assets:
  • Art by Ansimuz, Silvdragoon_D 
  • Hard Light by Trino
  • Keyboard Key Art by beamedeighth
  • Music & SFX by B.G.M, Intersonic Sound, ellr, Daniel Gooding, Idia, Mikael Vanninen, Yogurt Audio, WOW Sound
